Letter from Queen Navari:
I heard you cant get anything from that Giants, instead, they even showed you their hostile.
Now, just come back to Town of Oren, and show them our kindness, go meet up with High Priest Hollint of Einhasad's Temple at Town of Oren.
(I left a Scroll of Escapealong with the letter in this envelope. If you want to have a quick travel, then just use it.)
